modName: Craftable Standalone Yamato Sword from DMC
summary: Vergil's Yamato sword. Craftable, Temperable, and Standalone.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a one-handed weapon weapon, Yamato, to the Daedric category.
<br />
<br />After all, Daedric is the closest to what the Devil twins were like.
<br />
<br />Requires the same materials as a Daedric sword. Have fun!
<br />
<br />You can also craft a scabbard version of his sword because he would weild it sheathed as a weapon as well. Only requires additional
<br />Firewood.
<br />
<br />Recommended mods:
<br />
<br />[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58973]Unlocked Grip
<br />[/url]
<br />Because sometimes you want to switch to two-hands. (Would still have one-handed damage values, but benefit from two-hand perks). Vergil would occasionally wield it, rarely, in two-hands, but that doesn't change the weapon itself of course.
<br />
<br />Note: Elysees has a better mod that does all this but keeps the scabbard as a shield and animates putting your Yamato in to the scabbard which is pretty cool. It's not on the Nexus though. It doesn't have the option of having a Yamato in Scabbard as a weapon though.
author: Rune Katashima
